description: Try our easy to follow Mexican Pulled Pork recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mexican Pulled Pork Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove cooker from heat and release pressure as in step 3. Serve pork with salsa, sour cream and coriander leaves.
